overview: Produced live by Artistry Theater and Visual Arts in November 2021, "Little Women the Broadway Musical" is an adaptation of Louisa May Alcottâ€™s beloved book based on her own life. Little Women is a captivating and timeless story about family, friendship, heartache, hope and everlasting love. A coming of age story set in a time when the world was changing, about forging your own path and deciding what traditions to carry with you and what to leave behind.
title: Little Women The Broadway Musical
